title: 3rd Year Guidance
content: How to do well in third year generally?Like aiming for 9 both sems(need to lmao),Capstone Work,Internships and stuff?Also what books and references were used for 5th sem?(I have taken HCI and BD as electives)

comments.body: Thank you so much for the answer!

Ahh okay Thank you so much for a valuable answer....I just had a few doubts...

soo...if I currently lie between 7.5 to 8  gpa,Will I be eligible to write for any companies for internship tests?Also I have a decent hold of DSA but can you suggest some sites where I can find prev year coding test questions to get a feel of the level?As for projects can we display our college projects too(along with projects I made outside of college)?
Could any ece student clarify this doubt as wellðŸ˜…
